SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Direction
Storing sets of variables that determines the facing direction of wall or door in a room
Door
Door that connects two different rooms within the maze.
DoorNeedingSpell
Door needing spell to be open.
EnchantedMazeFactory
Factory class creating enchanted maze components, including rooms that requires spells casting and the door needing spell to unlock.
EnchantedRoom
Enchanted room within the maze.
Main
 
MapSite
abstract class MapSite is used for all components in the maze defining the interaction with maze objects like walls, doors and rooms.
Maze
maze structure in the game, which contains the collection of rooms that are connected with the door components.
MazeFactory
Factory class creating enchanted maze components.
MazeGame
MazeGame class is important to create and set up the maze game environment.
Room
Room within the maze.
Spell
spell associated with maze's components within the maze.
Wall
walls that are surrounding the room.
